alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 1:51PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Meade, southeastern Lawrence and central Pennington Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 151 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles north of Johnson Siding, or 10 miles northwest of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hisega around 155 PM MDT. Summerset around 200 PM MDT. Black Hawk around 210 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rapid City, Rapid Valley and northwestern Ellsworth Air Force Base. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 48 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Northern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
